articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with Ri Sol Ju visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Wednesday, the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Visitors included senior officials of the party, state and army, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the WPK, members of the central guiding bodies of the party in Pyongyang, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly in Pyongyang, leading officials of armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions and officials of the party Central Committee.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are standing. 
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues.
					
					 Also laid there was a floral basket in the joint name of the C.C. the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the NDC of the DPRK, the Presidium of the SPA of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un together with visitors paid high tribute to the statues in the humblest reverence.
					
					 He entered the immortality hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state. 
					
					 He together with visitors paid respectful homage and made deep bow to Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence.
					
					 The visitors went round the hall where orders Kim Jong Il received are on display, the mourners' hall and halls which house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him.

articles.title: Memorial Service Held on of Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary
articles.content:
Memorial Service Held on of Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A solemn national memorial service was held in Pyongyang on Wednesday, the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present at the service was Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 Among those present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Pong Ju, Hwang Pyong So and other senior officials of the party, state and army, chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, heroes and those who had the honor of being received by the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and merited persons from across the country, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, bereaved families of the revolutionary martyrs, working people, overseas Koreans and those related to the revolutionary activities of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there were foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here, staff members of the military attaches corps here and other foreign guests. 
					
					 All the participants paid silent tribute in the humblest reverence to Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a memorial address.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who was born as a son of the guerillas in the biting cold of the thick forest of Mt. Paektu, hewed the arduous revolution with the soul and spirit of Mt. Paektu till the last moments of his life, accomplishing the greatest cause no one in the world could ever do at that time, Kim Yong Nam said, and went on:
					
					 He made a pledge of history to glorify the DPRK, true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung, standing on Ryongnam Hill aglow with sunrise in his early years. He regarded it as his lifelong mission to carry forward the President's cause through generations and worked heart and soul to perform it.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of the President as Kimilsungism and indisputably proved its invincibility and truth. He guaranteed the absolute authority and prestige of the President in every way and thoroughly established the President's monolithic ideological system, monolithic leadership system.
					
					 Always finding himself on the forefront of the anti-imperialist military confrontation and national defence over more than half a century, he led to steady victories the unheard-of confrontation with imperialism and the U.S., and the battle for defending socialism.
					
					 He settled lots of contemporary difficult and complicated problems in a perfect manner and at the best level while steering the historic cause of developing in all fields socialism centered on the popular masses which was set up by the President.
					
					 From the very day he embarked upon the road of revolution he always shared joy and sorrow with the service personnel and people. He made ceaseless journeys to mix with the people, going in jumper till the last moments of his life.
					
					 He took warm care of revolutionary soldiers and led them forward, regarding them as the most precious revolutionary comrades.
					
					 He provided undying ideological and theoretical guidelines promising the everlasting victory for the era of independence and Songun and enriched the treasure house of the history of human thought.
					
					 He laid powerful political, military and economic foundations for the rosy future of Songun Korea for all eternity.
					
					 It was his greatest exploit on behalf of the country and its people, times and history that he successfully settled the issue of succession to the leadership, the basic issue in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He provided the eternal foundation for the ever-lasting prosperity of the glorious era of Kim Jong Un and sowed seeds for the prosperity of the generations to come. These immortal exploits will shine forever with the triumphant advance of the great Paektusan nation. 
					
					 Kim Yong Nam called on all the people to dynamically advance towards the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, holding aloft the unfurled flag bearing the immortal beaming images of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, made a speech to vow loyalty on behalf of the WPK; KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, on behalf of the KPA; and Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, on behalf of the youth.
					
					 They said the revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Jong Il, who laid eternal  foundation for steady victories of the glorious era of Kim Jong Un, leaving unprecedented traces in the history of the nation spanning 5,000 years, are shedding rays as the most precious wealth of Kim Il Sung's Korea.
					
					 They called on all the party members, service personnel and people to devotedly implement the last instructions of Kim Jong Il and surely build the great Paektusan nation where his lifelong intention and wishes will come true on this land. 
					
					 Then the artillery salute boomed in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Memorial services took place in all provinces, cities (districts) and counties and at industrial complexes on Wednesday.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets PM of DR Congo
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets PM of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Augustin Matata Ponyo on his reappointment as prime minister of the DR Congo.
					 The message wished the prime minister steady bigger success in his work for the socio-economic development of the country and people's well-being.
					
					 On the same day DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to Raymond Tchibanda Ntounga Moulongo on his reappointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of the DR Congo.

articles.title: Jordanian King to Boost Cooperation with DPRK
articles.content:
Jordanian King to Boost Cooperation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Jang Myong Ho, DPRK ambassador to Jordan, presented his credentials to Abdullah II, king of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan, on Dec. 10.
					 The king expressed expectation that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries, the economic relations in particular, would grow strong. 
					
					 The Jordanian government will positively cooperate with the DPRK to improve the bilateral ties, the king added.

articles.title: FM Urges European Countries Not to Peddle "Human Rights Issue"
articles.content:
FM Urges European Countries Not to Peddle "Human Rights Issue"
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK answered a question raised by KCNA on Wednesday in connection with the disclosure of European countries' conspiracy with the U.S. in its human rights abuses.
					 At a time when cruel tortures committed by the CIA against inmates in its secret prisons were disclosed recently to come under fire by the international community, the information that European countries had conspired with the U.S. in them was brought to light. This is sparking great uproar. 
					
					 According to it, 21 European countries including Britain actively cooperated with the U.S. in its human rights abuses as evidenced by the facts that they allowed the CIA to set up secret prisons and interrogation bases and Okayed inmates' passage through their territories and their stay there.
					
					 EU and European countries have so far often found fault with other countries over their alleged human rights violations, behaving as if they were a "model" in protecting the human rights. And they have zealously joined the U.S. in its "human rights" campaign against the DPRK. 
					
					 But, this time, it was disclosed that most of EU member states became servants in the U.S. brutal human rights abuses. This brought to daylight the fact that the signboard of "human rights protection", which was professed as one of its major pillars of EU policies, was only ostentation and proved to be a smokescreen to conceal a political hypocrisy peculiar to Europe. 
					
					 The European countries are now faced with a strong condemnation and pressure at home and abroad. There come strange voices from several European countries that they only gave a green light to CIA to operate secret prisons but did not grant a right to torture prisoners. There also comes a spate of discontent among them. Those countries grumble that they demanded the deletion of their cooperation in U.S. acts of torture but it was opened to public as it was. 
					
					 In the final analysis, Europe has been reduced to a servant fated to sit in the dock for acting under the baton of the U.S. It scuttled the human rights dialogue with the DPRK, which had been smoothly under way a decade ago, under the wire-pulling of the U.S. over the DPRK's nuclear issue.
					
					 Recently alone, EU recognized the DPRK's will to seek an international cooperation in the field of human rights. But, pressurized by the U.S., EU behaved so recklessly as taking the lead in adopting the "human rights resolution" against DPRK, which is based on lies told by a few human dregs at the UN General Assembly.
					
					 European countries should be well aware of their own situations where they have lost even elementary qualifications to peddle the "human rights issue" of somebody. They would be well advised to bear in mind that they would only harm their own interests and lose their faces if they follow others without independent viewpoints. 
					
					 If European countries are truly concerned for the protection of human rights, they should learn how to behave themselves and stop peddling "human rights issue" in the DPRK peppered with fabrications, though belatedly, and opt for calling the extra-large scale human rights violations by the U.S. into question at the UN and on other international fora.
					
					 By doing so, Europe can only redress its past and become a genuine champion of human rights as claimed by it.

articles.title: KFPD Rejects Anti-DPRK Forces' Accusations
articles.content:
KFPD Rejects Anti-DPRK Forces' Accusations
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The hostile forces against the DPRK held a "hearing on the human rights situation in north Korea" at the British parliament on Dec. 10, World Day of Human Rights. They prodded such human scum as "defectors from the north" into asserting that a "systematic elimination of the disabled was taking place in north Korea" and spread sheer sophism that the DPRK is set to send its team to Paralympic Games, etc. to conceal its "policy of eliminating the people with disabilities".
					 A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled (KFPD) made public a statement on Tuesday in this regard.
					
					 This is an intolerable abuse of the DPRK and an unbearable insult and mockery of the disabled people, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK government has consistently respected the human dignity of the disabled and provided them with all conditions and circumstances so that they may enjoy equal social and political rights with the ordinary people and take active part in the state and social activities.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Democratic Blind Alliance of Korea was formed in February, Juche 37 (1948) and has since conducted brisk activities. Since its founding the DPRK has taken a series of legal and institutional steps for preferential state treatment and protection of the disabled and spared no investment in implementing them.
					
					 The Central Committee of the KFPD was founded in 1998 with an objective of sincerely helping the state shape and implement the policies of protecting the disabled and controlling and guiding the work for protecting the disabled in an integral manner.
					
					 Sanatoriums are found everywhere for the disabled so that they are given free functional rehabilitation service. The modern Munsu Functional Rehabilitation Clinic appeared in Pyongyang City in 2013 to render comprehensive functional rehabilitation service to the disabled.
					
					 The DPRK Law on the Protection of the Disabled adopted on June 18, 2003 and amended and supplemented in November, 2013 provides a legal guarantee for their rights. 
					
					 It has been confirmed by foreign experts and media persons of AP, APTN and other Western media through their visits and news coverage activities that the rights, dignity and interests of the disabled are satisfactorily ensured both on a legal basis and in their life thanks to the correct policy of the DPRK government.
					
					 The hostile forces' racket over "issue of the disabled" is nothing but a poor attempt to stir up the atmosphere of international pressure on the DPRK over its "human rights" even by picking up a new "human rights issue".
					
					 The reckless trumpeting made by "defectors from the north" to get a petty amount of dollars is not worth even a passing note. But it is more ridiculous for politicians of Britain and other Western countries to chime in with their propaganda, utterly ignorant of the reality.
					
					 Those hostile forces had better stop at once their mean and poor smear campaign for meeting their sinister political purposes.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to Statues by Syrian, Mongolian Presidents
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to Statues by Syrian, Mongolian Presidents
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets sent by Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, and Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj, president of Mongolia, were laid before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Wednesday, the third anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues and Mosaics Depicting Them
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues and Mosaics Depicting Them
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA), people from all walks of life, school youth and children laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and mosaics depicting their beaming images in various parts of the country on the third anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					 Service personnel and people of all social standings here visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to pay homage to them.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Placed before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, and organs, enterprises, factories, farms and schools of various levels here.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front was laid before the statues.
					
					 Floral baskets in the names of KPA units, organs and enterprises, bouquets and flowers were placed before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and mosaics depicting their smiling images in various places here, including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 Service personnel, working people, school youth and children visited the statues of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and mosaics depicting their smiling images in various parts of the country.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and overseas compatriots staying in the motherland visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Wednesday, the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the immortality hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state they paid homage to him.
					
					 They looked round the hall where the orders he received are on display and the halls that house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of his life.

articles.title: Foreign Personages Send Floral Baskets to Statues
articles.content:
Foreign Personages Send Floral Baskets to Statues
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola, Manik Mukherjee, general secretary of the International Anti-Imperialism Coordinating Committee, Kosima Weber Liu, executive director of the Environmental Education Media Project, and the Reak Smey Angkor International Hospital of Cambodia sent floral baskets to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the third anniversary of Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 Those floral baskets were laid before the statues on Dec. 17. 
					
					 Floral baskets were sent to the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea from the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the Chinese embassy here on the same occasion.

articles.title: Letter from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Letter from C.C., AINDF
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Wednesday, the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The past three years were the days when the Koreans deeply realized what a great man they had held at the helm of the nation, and the course of proud victory in which the glorious revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was given steady continuity generation after generation and the dignity and pride of the nation demonstrated on the highest level thanks to Kim Jong Un, the letter said.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the peerless great man who made sure that the revolutionary idea of the President shed its rays as the eternal guiding idea in the era of independence, strengthened the party, army and state into the ones of the President and thus ensured the continuity of the cause of the sun for all ages through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and outstanding leadership, and the peerless patriot who firmly defended socialism centred on the popular masses and turned the north into a political and ideological power and world's military power with his invincible Songun politics, it noted.
					
					 He ushered in the June 15 era of reunification, the new era of By Our Nation Itself, and thus provided the firm foundation for the independent reunification, peace and prosperity and opened the wide avenue of reunification, it stressed, adding that these patriotic feats for reunification will be everlasting together with the history of the nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's noble love for compatriots devoted to the nation is shedding its rays forever and the undying revolutionary feats he performed for the country is shining eternally thanks to Kim Jong Un, it noted.
					
					 The vanguard fighters of the AINDF and patriotic people of all social standings will uphold the leadership of Kim Jong Un to the end, with the high national pride of holding him in high esteem at the helm, the letter concluded.

articles.title: Letter Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Letter Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) Wednesday, the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Jong Il was the tender-hearted father as he further developed in depth the Juche-oriented idea of President Kim Il Sung on the movement of overseas Koreans to give a perfect exposition of all theoretical and practical issues arising in the patriotic movement of Chongryon, clearly indicated the road to be followed by Chongryon with his gifted wisdom and showed all loving care and solicitude for Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan, the letter said.
					
					 It noted that he always lives in the hearts of Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan as the defender of destiny and benevolent father as he protected Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and led to victory the movement of Koreans in Japan in the new century till the last moments of his great life.
					
					 Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan have advanced to carry out the last instructions of Kim Jong Il by overcoming sorrow over the loss of him and displaying strength and courage for the past three years, it said, adding that in those days of glory and victory they deeply grasped the truth that the revolutionary cause of Juche is sure to triumph and a new heyday will certainly be ushered in the movement of Koreans in Japan as they are led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It stressed that they will resolutely defend and further glorify the Juche-based idea of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu on the movement of overseas Koreans and their immortal exploits as taught by Kim Jong Un and do all works of Chongryon as intended and desired by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Letter from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the General Association of Koreans in China Tuesday on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Jong Il, who was born on Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of revolution, as the son of the guerilla army and grew up to be the great revolutionary, wisely led the party, army and people for a long period and performed immortal revolutionary exploits on behalf of the country, people, times and history, the letter said, and went on:
					
					 He, the great defender of socialism and justice, conducted energetic external activities for the victory of the socialist cause, global peace and stability and friendship and solidarity among peoples under the uplifted banner of independence against imperialism and put the international position and prestige of the DPRK on the highest level, making immortal contributions to the human cause of independence.
					
					 It expressed the resolution to wage a dynamic drive to build the DPRK into a thriving socialist nation by thoroughly applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism to practical activities, firmly rally broad segments of Koreans in China around the general association and build up it into the patriotic ranks strong in the Juche character and national identity positively conducting the patriotic movement for reunification.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China will invariably hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the sun of the nation, lodestar of national reunification and father the way it followed Kim Jong Il, and will become the true patriotic organization remaining loyal to Kim Jong Un by contributing to building a thriving nation, the letter stressed.

articles.title: People Observe Three Minutes Silence in Honor of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
People Observe Three Minutes Silence in Honor of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea was wrapped in the solemnest memorial atmosphere on Wednesday, the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Sirens sounded across the DPRK at noon all at once.
					
					 Engines, ships and vehicles sounded horns or whistles.
					
					 All the party members, service personnel and other people observed three minutes silence toward the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche where Kim Jong Il lies in state, and toward Pyongyang.

articles.title: Service Personnel, People Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Service Personnel, People Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Officials, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and people from all walks of life visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage to leader Kim Jong Il on Wednesday, the greatest memorial day of the nation.
					 They entered the hall where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Also placed there were a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statues.
					
					 They paid homage to Kim Jong Il at the hall where he lies in state.
					
					 They went round the hall where the orders he received are on display, the mourners' hall and the halls that house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him during his field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of his life.

articles.title: Concert Given on Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Concert Given on Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A remembrance concert titled "Great life" took place here on Wednesday, the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The concert was appreciated by senior officials of the party, state and army including Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae and Pak Pong Ju, chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party, armed forces organs, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, heroes and those who had the honor of being received by the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and merited persons.
					
					 Among those present on invitation were overseas Koreans, persons related to revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the  chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here and their wives, military attaches of foreign embassies here and their wives.
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers including narration "Story about the Family of Kubong Pass", female solo and chorus "Thinking of General" and dance and pangchang for cello trio "Attraction and Reverence".
					
					 Performers enthusiastically sang of the revolutionary life and exploits of Kim Jong Il who made ceaseless high-intensity forced march only for the people's happiness and the prosperity of the generations to come despite strong wind, snow and rain.
					
					 Whenever the tender-hearted image of Kim Jong Il was projected on the background of the stage amid the resounding of the hymn praising the great man, the audience clapped their hands. Tears were seen rolling out from their eyes.
					
					 The narration "Oh, snow in December" made the audience look back upon the unforgettable days of December when the people deeply grieved over Kim Jong Il's demise, lining both sides of tens of km route where they lamented, "Dear leader, don't go leaving behind this land and people you loved so much."

articles.title: High Tribute Paid to Kim Jong Il in Humblest Reverence
articles.content:
High Tribute Paid to Kim Jong Il in Humblest Reverence
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The whole country most solemnly honored the memory of leader Kim Jong Il on Wednesday, the third anniversary of his demise.
					 Many service personnel, working people and school youth and children visited the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on the greatest memorial day of the nation.
					
					 They paid tribute to the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Lots of people visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and portraits depicting their smiling images in different parts of the country.
					
					 Memorial events were held across the country.
					
					 There took place remembrance concerts by artistes in North Hwanghae, South Hamgyong provinces and other places.
					
					 The performers praised the sacred career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il who was born in Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of the revolution, as a son of the guerillas and devoted his all to the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Songun for decades.
					
					 Artistes in Jagang Province also gave a remembrance concert "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun" in which they sang of the world of his devotion as he put forward the people in Jagang Province as creators of the Kanggye spirit and opened the new history of a turn.
					
					 Workers, members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and youth and students in South Hwanghae Province and other parts of the country touched strings in the people's hearts through remembrance concerts.
					
					 Youth and students in South Hamgyong Province held a remembrance stage "The General and Flames of Hamnam" and talked about the unforgettable days when Kim Jong Il kindled the flames of Hamnam and showed loving care for the people.
					
					 In Ryanggang Province a remembrance meeting of persons who had the honor of being received by Kim Jong Il and those related to his revolutionary activities took place to convey stories and revolutionary anecdotes left by him in the days of field guidance.
					
					 Oath-taking meetings of workers, agricultural workers, members of the women's union and youth and students took place across the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Peerless Patriot
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Peerless Patriot
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The people and servicepersons of the DPRK are recalling with deep emotion the great life of leader Kim Jong Il, who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of people, on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.
					 Kim Jong Il in his lifetime had instilled into the people the truth that genuine patriotism is based on valuing and loving even a blade of grass and a tree of the country.
					
					 His masterpieces like "The Embrace of My Motherland" and "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee" are a clear manifestation of his ardent love for the country and people.
					
					 His great devotion to the prosperity of the country has been crowned with great achievements in the country, which inspires all the people to do their utmost to bring earlier a bright future of the country with conviction that it would surely emerge prosperous.
					
					 With ardent love for the country and people, Kim Jong Il had demonstrated the national dignity all over the world, overcoming all sorts of difficulties and hardships.
					
					 Therefore, the people and servicepersons of the DPRK are praising him as a peerless patriot for his great devotion.
					
					 On this occasion, they are fully determined to give fullest play to Kim Jong Il's patriotism under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Songun Revolution
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Songun Revolution
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- On the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il (Dec. 17), people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea recollect with deep emotion the undying feats he had performed for the country and the people. 
					 In his lifetime Kim Jong Il made a long journey of field guidance to more than 14,290 units across the country, which covers 670,000 kilometers, nearly 17 times the distance round the earth.
					
					 His ceaseless field guidance day and night and in all seasons led to an epoch-making turn in the activities of the Workers' Party of Korea and world-startling miracles in socialist construction.
					
					 In the mid-1990s when the country was at the crossroads of survival or ruin, he chose to take the road of Songun (military-first) revolution.
					
					 Under his energetic Songun leadership, the DPRK's single-minded unity and military might grew stronger while the flames of industrial revolution in the new century flared up.
					
					 In the last period of his life, too, he had continued his field guidance despite weather conditions and, consequently, eye-catching events took place one after another in the country.
					
					 Indeed, Kim Jong Il was a peerless patriot who devoted his all to the people's wellbeing and the nation's prosperity.

articles.title: Samovar Presented to Kim Jong Il by Russian Figure
articles.content:
Samovar Presented to Kim Jong Il by Russian Figure
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- On display at the International Friendship Exhibition House are a samovar and kettle presented to leader Kim Jong Il by the Manvet construction company of Russia in October Juche 86 (1997) on the occasion of his election as the general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The general manager of the company who had esteemed the leader from long ago prepared those gifts with the election as an occasion.
					
					 The Samovar, kettle and round support are decorated with showy floral patterns. 
					
					 Seen on the upper part of the samovar are letters "Gift to the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il in celebration of his election as the general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea. Apozhan Manvet".
					
					 When conveying those gifts to an official concerned, the general manager sincerely hoped that Kim Jong Il would have a rest even for a moment while taking fresh tea.

articles.title: Papers Editorially Observe Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise
articles.content:
Papers Editorially Observe Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise 
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Papers Wednesday carry editorials on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il, saying that he is always alive as the sun of the great Paektusan nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun says: Born as a son of guerrillas in Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of the revolution, he embarked on the road of the revolutionary leadership in his teens. He recorded an immortal heroic epic under the uplifted red flag all his life.
					
					 He is the eternal sun of Juche who sheds bright rays on the road of the era and the revolution with his outstanding revolutionary idea, the eternal sun of the nation who pushes ahead with the dynamic struggle for the final victory of building a thriving nation with his immortal patriotic feats and the eternal sun of life who trains staunch revolutionaries and a large unit of heroes with his precious revolutionary career.
					
					 He foresaw the requirements of the rapidly changing times and the prospect of the developing revolution and formulated President Kim Il Sung's idea of attaching importance to the army and military affairs as the Songun idea. This was the feats specially recorded in the history of human thought.
					
					 He wisely led the complicated revolution and construction of various phases at the helm of the party, state and revolutionary forces for years. His leadership exploits were unprecedented in their richness and changing impact. Exploring an untrodden path and weathering the sternest tempest of the Songun revolution all his life, he experienced all sorts of hardships as a revolutionary and human being.
					
					 His history of the sun is being given steady continuity by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 All the party members, service personnel and other people should become true comrades and genuine comrades-in-arms upholding Kim Jong Un's idea and leadership in any adversity with the absolute trust in him.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all Koreans to steadfastly keep to the road of the revolution covered by Kim Jong Il, rallied single-mindedly around Kim Jong Un and glorify the new century of the Juche revolution as the era of victory and glory.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Koreans in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia held a remembrance meeting on Dec 15 to commemorate the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Kim Chil Song, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, and other members of the confederation and compatriots took part in the meeting. 
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and paid silent tribute to him. 
					
					 Speakers said at the meeting Kim Jong Il devoted all his life to the happiness of the people and the prosperity of the country. 
					
					 The immortal exploits he performed by devoting himself to the country and its people, making journeys to mix with people till the last moments of his revolutionary life, will shine long, they said, and went on:
					
					 Thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un the behests of Kim Jong Il are being successfully implemented and the building of a thriving nation is making successful progress. 
					
					 The sun is shining all the time, the speakers noted, calling on all the compatriots to actively turn out in the efforts to bring earlier national reunification true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Korean in US
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Korean in US
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Gifted great artiste" praising the exploits leader Kim Jong Il performed in the development of literature and art was posted on Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on Dec. 15. It was contributed by a member of the editorial desk of the paper.
					 The article lauded Kim Jong Il for performing such great exploits which will go down in the history of not only the Korean nation but also the world as the enforcement of the Songun politics based on the Juche idea, the DPRK's access to nukes for peace of humankind, successful launches of satellites and adoption of north-south joint declarations.
					
					 Praising his exploits in the field of literature and art, the article continued:
					
					 When I visited the north, I realized that Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il was a great artiste who mastered both theory and practice while meeting artistes in various fields including film, drama, fine art, music and dance, and that he made sure that the north would become a country where its art fully bloomed in the life of its people by enforcing the Juche-based art policy.
					
					 His works on the literature and art and anecdotes left by him during his field guidance fully prove that he was such a gifted great artiste.
					
					 He inherited the prominent wisdom of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Recalling that Kim Jong Il adapted such literary works "Sea of Blood", "Mountain Shrine" personally created by the President during the anti-Japanese war for revolutionary operas and dramas, the article said Kim Jong Il was a great artiste most highly praised by the world along with the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in China
 Beijing, December 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting for remembering leader Kim Jong Il took place in Beijing on Tuesday.
					 It was attended by personages and members of the Public Center for Diplomatic and Cultural Exchange of China, the Arab Information Center in China and the Jindallae Children's Foundation.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to China and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They watched the Korean film "Okryu Children's Hospital."
					
					 The executive director of the Public Center for Diplomatic and Cultural Exchange of China praised Kim Jong Il as the great leader of the service personnel and people of the DPRK who dedicated himself to the victorious advance of the Korean revolution, prosperity of the country and happiness of its people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The executive director sincerely hoped that the Korean people would build a thriving nation at an early date under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un and the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The chairman of the Arab Information Center in China said the life of Kim Jong Il was the one of the great leader, revolutionary and forerunner who glorified the idea and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and dedicated himself to the country and its people.
					
					  Kim Jong Il was a prominent leader who performed great exploits unprecedented in history and the great man boundlessly praised by the Korean people and other peoples in the world, he added.

articles.title: Internet Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Russia
articles.content:
Internet Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A national internet seminar on the undying exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Russia on Dec. 7.
					 It was attended by representatives of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism, Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Youth Association for the Study of the Songun Policy, Kim Jong Suk Women’s Union and its Moscow branch, Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and its branches.
					
					 Speeches were made by Mikhail Panchenko, chairman of the Russian Youth Association for the Study of the Songun Policy, Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the chairman of its Nidjegorod Regional Branch, Vadim Kudimin, director of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, and the vice-chairman of the Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia.
					
					 The speakers explained and proved that Kim Jong Il further developed in depth the idea and line of President Kim Il Sung through his energetic ideo-theoretical activities in the whole period of leading the revolution and construction, and successfully applied them to the revolutionary practice.
					
					 He foiled all the challenges and moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK with his original Songun politics, firmly defended socialism and demonstrated the sovereignty and dignity of the country before the world, they said, adding:
					
					 He was the genuine leader of the people and prominent leader who rallied all the service personnel and people as one in the hardest period, made sure that they developed the nuclear and space technology by their own efforts and brought about a turning phase for building a thriving nation.
					
					 A message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Message from Participants in Internet Seminar on Songun
articles.content:
Message from Participants in Internet Seminar on Songun
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the international internet seminar on Songun held on Dec. 4 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The message said:
					
					 We held an international internet seminar on Songun on the theme of "Undying Songun revolutionary idea and leadership exploits of HE Kim Jong Il" in Dhaka, Bangladesh on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.
					
					 We pay our highest tribute to HE Kim Jong Il who made undying contributions to the accomplishment of the cause of global independence.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il was an outstanding leader of the Korean people and other progressives in the world as he dedicated himself to global peace and security under the unfurled banner of independence against imperialism.
					
					 We are firmly convinced that the Workers' Party of Korea and the service personnel and people of the DPRK would register bigger successes in their glorious struggle for defending socialism under the wise Songun leadership of Your Excellency.
					
					 We wholeheartedly wish Your Excellency good health.

articles.title: Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed by Russian Papers
articles.content:
Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed by Russian Papers
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Russian papers featured articles to observe the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Komsomolskaya Pravda from Dec. 5 to 10 dedicated its one whole page to articles titled "Korean people honor memory of Comrade Kim Jong Il" and "Comrade Kim Jong Il was born in Mt. Paektu" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and his photos.
					
					 Vladivostok on Dec. 10 devoted its one whole page to a special write-up under the bannerline "Memory of great leader" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Dec. 10-16 issue of Pravda Primoriya carried an article dealing with the Songun leadership exploits of the peerless great man who firmly defended the socialist country from the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK by pursuing his original Songun politics. It was accompanied with photos of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un providing the Songun revolutionary leadership together.
					
					 Rio Panorama on Dec. 10 devoted its one whole page to articles under the bannerline "For country and people all his life" accompanied with a photo of Kim Jong Il. The articles introduced his great personality as the father of the people who led the WPK and the Korean people to victory and glory with his extraordinary ideological and theoretical wisdom and noble popular traits.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Jong Il Lauded by Indonesian, Laotian Papers
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Jong Il Lauded by Indonesian, Laotian Papers
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Papers of Indonesia and Laos dedicated special write-ups to the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il, accompanied with the portrait of the smiling leader.
					 The Indonesian paper International Media on Dec. 3 carried an article titled "Third anniversary of demise of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il", which said:
					
					 It has been three years since the demise of Kim Jong Il, the peerless great man.
					
					 The three years are characterized by the noble moral sense of obligation displayed by the Korean people who have remained loyal to him, ardently yearning after him.
					
					 The Korean people are holding him in high esteem as their eternal leader and adding eternal brilliance to his exploits.
					
					 The paper in another article titled "Eternal path of Korean people" introduced that the DPRK is shedding its rays as a socialist nation centered on the popular masses as it has developed on the basis of independence, emerged victorious and demonstrated its dignity by dint of Songun.
					
					 The Lao paper Pasason on Dec. 4 carried an article titled "Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il and Korea today."
					
					 The article noted:
					
					 The DPRK which has dynamically stepped up the building of a thriving nation despite all difficulties under the uplifted banner of Songun would be unthinkable apart from Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is carrying forward his idea and cause, has wisely led the building of an economic power while bolstering up the defence capability of the country.
					
					 It is the strong faith and will of the Korean people to thoroughly carry out the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Lao paper Vatelao carried a similar article on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Mexican Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Mexican Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, released a statement titled "Great Comrade Kim Jong Il will be immortal" on Dec. 9.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was born in Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of the Korean revolution, and grew up to be the son of the guerilla army and the Korean nation, hearing the gun reports of the grand anti-Japanese war as a lullaby. His life was the one of the great and noble man.
					
					 He was the peerless Songun brilliant commander who turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological power which achieved the single-minded unity, a military power and a nuclear weapons state that no formidable enemy dares provoke by leading the Korean revolution and the socialist construction to victory with his gifted idea and theories and extraordinary leadership.
					
					 He was a peerless patriot and benevolent father of the people who unfolded a grand plan for building a thriving nation and made a long journey of the revolution with his boundless love and devotion for the country and people throughout his life.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean people are dynamically advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, resolutely foiling the pressure and intervention by the imperialists, united closer around Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is identical to Kim Jong Il in thinking and purpose.
					
					 The sacred august name of Kim Jong Il and his great exploits will always be remembered not only by the Korean people but also by other world progressives.
					
					 All the members of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico pay highest tribute to him and hope that the WPK and the Korean people would make fresh innovations and work miracles in the drive for building a thriving nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, holding aloft the red flag of revolution under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Memorial Service Held in Peru
articles.content:
Memorial Service Held in Peru
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A memorial service took place in Lima, Peru on Dec. 12 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were representatives of political parties and organizations of Peru, including the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students, the Revolutionary Socialist Party, the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk and the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, and masses.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Peru and his embassy officials were present on invitation.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students, said that Kim Jong Il was the great leader who guided the socialist cause to victory.
					
					 Victor Oliva Miguel, general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party, noted that Kim Jong Il was the symbol and incarnation of the unity.
					
					 Eleazar Ramos Loarte, secretary general of the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said that very great are the feats performed by Kim Jong Il who made a theoretical and practical verification of the inevitability of the socialist victory at the end of the last century.
					
					 Yuri Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, said: To hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leader of the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence is the glory and pride and the bounden duty and obligation of all of us.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Cuba
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting took place in Havana, Cuba on Dec. 12 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venue of the meeting were photos dealing with his revolutionary life and feats.
					
					 Present there were personages of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples and the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and masses.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Cuba and his embassy officials were present on invitation. 
					
					 Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, said that Kim Jong Il will always be with the glorious Workers' Party of Korea, the Korean People's Army and the Korean people.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il is boundlessly revered not only by the Korean people but also by the progressives as he developed in depth the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and performed the great feats for the building of socialism, reunification of Korea and cause of global independence.
					
					 The Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification will make positive efforts for Korea's reunification in the future, too, true to the intention of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who dedicated themselves to Korea's reunification till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 The Cuban people believe that the Korean people would certainly build a thriving nation with the might of Songun, true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Austria
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was brought out in booklet by an Austrian publishing house on Dec. 9. 
					 The work published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013) deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 It also clarifies the essence and originality of his Songun revolutionary idea and the tasks for successfully accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 3o aniversario del deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el dia 17 junto con Ri Sol Ju el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Le acompanaron tambien los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los secretarios responsables de los comites del PTC en las provincias, los miembros del organo de direccion del CC del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang, los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la misma ciudad, los funcionarios directivos de los organismos de fuerzas armadas, ministerios, organos centrales y los funcionarios del CC del PTC.
					
					El Mariscal entro en el salon donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Fueron colocados ante las estatuas un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal y el otro en nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del PTC, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC.
					
					Junto con los participantes, Kim Jong Un rindio homenaje postumo a los Generalisimos ante sus estatuas de pie y al Dirigente en el salon de eternidad donde esta conservado su cuerpo.
					
					Los participantes recorrieron la sala de conservacion de ordenes recibidas por el Dirigente, el hall de llantos y las salas de conservacion de auto, carro electrico, barco y tren usados por el.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto central de recordacion de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto central de recordacion de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 3o aniversario del fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, tuvo lugar el dia 17 con solemnidad en esta capital el acto central de recordacion. 
					Asistio a la ocasion el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Participaron tambien Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Pong Ju, Hwang Pyong So y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los heroes, las personas quienes fueron recibidas por el Dirigente, los ameritados provenientes de distintas localidades del pais, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, familiares de martires revolucionarios, trabajadores, los compatriotas en ultramar, los compatriotas que estan relacionados con el Dirigente, y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					Fueron invitados tambien los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales, los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, acreditados en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					Todos los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente. 
					
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					El orador dijo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, nacido como hijo de la guerrilla en la selva primitiva donde hace el viento picante del Paektu, cumplio la magna causa inalcanzable por nadie recorriendo hasta el ultimo momento de su vida el arduo camino de la revolucion con el espiritu del Paektu. 
					
					En el primer dia de sus estudios en la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente subio a la colina Ryongnam y tomo el juramento de hacer grande a Corea aprendiendo el noble proposito del Presidente Kim Il Sung y presento como mision de toda su vida continuar generacion tras generacion la causa de ese sol de la nacion, recordo el orador y continuo: 
					
					El Dirigente definio la idea revolucionaria del Presidente como Kimilsungismo y argumento la veracidad de esta doctrina. Al mismo tiempo, aseguro al maximo la autoridad absoluta del Presidente y establecio estrictamente el sistema de unica ideologia y unica direccion de el. 
					
					Durante mas de medio siglo, condujo siempre a la victoria la confrontacion antiyanqui y antiimperialista y la batalla de defensa del socialismo encontrandose siempre en la primera linea del frente militar antiimperialista por la defensa de la patria. 
					
					Al conducir al frente la historica causa para desarrollar el socialismo centrado en las masas populares, fundado por el Presidente, resolvio perfectamente muchas tareas dificiles y complicadas de la epoca. 
					
					Siempre en vestido de campana, estuvo entre los militares y habitantes compartiendo con ellos las alegrias y las penas desde el primer dia de sus actividades revolucionarias hasta el ultimo momento de su vida. 
					
					Formo a cada uno de los camaradas revolucionarios considerandolos como lo mas valioso del mundo. 
					
					Preparo la guia ideo-teorica para garantizar el avance victorioso de la era de independencia, la del Songun, y enriquecio incesantemente el tesorero de pensamientos de la humanidad. 
					
					Sento la solida base politica, militar, economica para asegurar el futuro maravilloso de la Corea del Songun. 
					
					La proeza mas notable del Dirigente Kim Jong Il realizada por la patria, el pueblo, la epoca y la historia es haber resuelto perfectamente el problema de sucesion de la direccion, clave en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Seran eternas junto con el avance victorioso de la potencia del monte Paektu las imborrables proezas del Dirigente quien sento la base de eterna prosperidad de la gloriosa era de Kim Jong Un y preparo las fuentes de todas las felicidades. 
					
					Todos deben marchar a pasos firmes hacia la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la sabia orientacion del Mariscal levantando en alto las banderas del sol imperecedero de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Acto seguido, pronunciaron discursos de juramento Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y Jon Yong Nam, presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, en representacion del PTC, el EPC y la juventud, respectivamente. 
					
					Ellos dijeron que brillan como valiosos patrimonios de la Corea del Sol la vida revolucionaria y las indelebles proezas del Dirigente quien sento la base eterna para el avance victorioso de la gloriosa era de Kim Jong Un dejando las huellas de orientacion nunca vistas en la historia nacional de 5 milenios.
					
					Llamaron a todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes a materializar a riesgo de la vida los legados del Dirigente para levantar sin falta sobre el territorio patrio la potencia del monte Paektu. 
					
					Se tiraron las salvas en memoria de Kim Jong Il. 
					
					　El mismo dia, tuvieron lugar los actos similares en todas las provincias, ciudades (o municipios), distritos y complejos industriales.

articles.title: Portavoz de CC de FPDC desmiente demagogia anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz de CC de FPDC desmiente demagogia anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 10, con motivo del Dia Mundial de los DDHH, las fuerzas hostiles anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea convocaron una llamada "audiencia sobre la situacion de derechos humanos del Norte de Corea" en el parlamento britanico.
					En esa ocasion, hicieron a la chusma conocida como "fugitivos  norcoreanos" a declarar que "en el Norte de Corea se realiza de manera sistematica la exterminacion de discapacitados".
					
					Ademas, difundieron la insistencia absurda segun la cual el Norte de Corea envia su seleccion a los Juegos Paralimpicos para ocultar su "politica de exterminacion de discapacitados".
					
					En su declaracion publicada el dia 16, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Federacion de Proteccion a Discapacitados de Corea condeno esa demagogia contra la RPDC calificandola de insulto y burla insoportable a los discapacitados.
					
					El documento apunta que el gobierno de la RPDC respeta siempre la dignidad de los discapacitados y les garantiza todas las condiciones y ambiente necesario para que ellos tomen parte activa en las actividades del Estado y sociedad disfrutando iguales derechos socio-politicos que los hombres normales.
					
					En febrero del 37 (1948) de la Era Juche, se constituyo el Comite Central de la Union de los Ciegos Democraticos de Corea que dinamizo sus actividades, recuerda la nota y prosigue:
					
					Despues de fundacion de la RPDC, se tomaron las medidas legales e institucionales para tratar con preferencia y proteger a los discapacitados y hubo enormes inversiones estatales en las labores para ponerlas en practica.
					
					En 1998, se organizo el CC de la FPDC que ayuda al Estado en la elaboracion y materializacion de la politica de proteccion a discapacitados y controla unificadamente esta labor.
					
					Por doquier del pais, se acondicionaron magnificamente los sanatorios para los discapacitados quienes reciben a gratis alli el servicio medico de recuperacion.
					
					En 2013, se inauguro en la ciudad de Pyongyang el moderno Centro de Recuperacion de Munsu que ofrece a los discapacitados el servicio general de rehabilitacion funcional.
					
					La ley de proteccion a discapacitados de la RPDC, adoptada el 18 de junio de 2003 y enmendada y complementada en noviembre de 2013, asegura con suficiencia y por via legal los derechos de ellos.
					
					Esto fue confirmado a traves de la visita al terreno y la cobertura hechas por los especialistas extranjeros y los medios de prensa del Occidente como AP de EE.UU. y APTN de Gran Bretana.
					
					Sin embargo, las fuerzas hostiles libran la campana intrigante inventando hasta el "problema de discapacitados", lo cual parte de su intencion de contribuir a hacer mas fuerte el ambiente internacional de presion anti-RPDC en la esfera de "DDHH".
					
					Es muy ridicula la conducta de los politiqueros de algunos paises occidentales, incluso Gran Bretana, que se suman, sin conocer la realidad, a la chismografia que pronuncian los "fugitivos norcoreanos" para ganarse un punado de dinero.
					
					Las fuerzas hostiles anti-RPDC deben parar ahora mismo su sucia campana intrigante que persigue siniestros objetivos politicos.

articles.title: Militares y civiles coreanos guardan tres minutos de silencio en memoria de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Militares y civiles coreanos guardan tres minutos de silencio en memoria de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hoy, dia del 3o aniversario del fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, toda la tierra patria esta llena del ambiente mas sublime.
					A las 12 en punto, las locomotoras, barcos y carros de todo el pais tocaron la sirena simultaneamente.
					
					Los militantes del Partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los habitantes de todo el pais guardaron 3 minutos de silencio en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il encontrandose de pie hacia el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, supremo lugar sagrado del Juche, y hacia la capital Pyongyang.
